At least that guy is helping.

There are groups from each of the alliances out there, on training maneuvers. And they haven't lifted a finger to help. It's disgusting.

Still, if you're going out there, and you need a place to rest and recover, they have camps scattered around the island. Just don't expect them to come rescue you, if you get in trouble.

Anyway...good luck, . And thanks for helping. It means a lot.

Another federation flunky? By all means, let me put this time-wasting conversation on hold so I can have an equally pointless discussion with you.

Well? What is it?"Have you been able to find any survivors?"

Look. As I was telling this guy, we're really sorry that this disaster happened while we were here...but rescue operations just aren't in our budget.

We'll finish up our training exercises, and then get out of your hair, but we can't spare any troops or supplies to do the federation's job.

Now, if you have any more questions, come see me when I'm back in my office outside Velika. Good day."Sorry to have taken your valuable time."

Greetings, friend.
I'm happy to report that the Enlightened Union has been actively seeking missing federation personnel...sadly, with little success thus far.

Please inform Adria that I will be taking my fellow agents out again shortly for another sweep of the area, in hopes of finding survivors.

Now, was there something else I could help you with?"Hm. What areas have you searched so far?"

Alas, only a few, most in the immediate vicinity of this camp.

It's the monsters, you see. We weren't expecting to have to deal with them, so we are ill-equipped to drive them off.

Pity. If they weren't so omnipresent, we might be able to search a larger area..."If I deal with them, can you step up your search?"

That would be most...acceptable.

Very well, friend. You hurl yourself into mortal combat with these beasts, and should you prevail, I promise not only to increase the range of our search, but I will use the time to prepare a full report on our findings so far."Very well. I'll be back shortly."

You survived a battle with five of those beasts? My, my...you really are noteworthy, aren't you? I won't underestimate you next time. We can be absolutely certain of that.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"That's...fine. You had a report for me?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Ah, yes.

I thought it might interest you that the night of the World Tree's destruction, the Enlightened Union was conducting exercises near the Shrine of Yurianâ€”from which one has a very clear view of the Tower Base.

When the sky got dark, and the rumbling noises commenced, we were naturally curious. From our vantage point, I was able to clearly discern several individuals in Iron Order livery running away from the base in some haste.

I'm certainly not...suggesting their involvement. However, it seems likely that, given their proximity to the initial destruction, they may have a better idea of where to look for the federation's missing personnel."Interesting. I'll look into that."

What is it? It's bad enough our training exercise has been completely disrupted, but now you expect me to report on it?

Fine! Here's my official report: The Iron Order is officially annoyed! Got it? Want me to sign that for you?"I'm told you were present when the World Tree was destroyed."

Hah! Wrong! Some investigator you are!

I was at Arun Heights. So were all my troops.

We passed through the camp down by Tainted Gorge. Why don't you go ask them, if you don't believe me?"Someone said they saw you by Tower Base."

Earlier in the day, yes! And we rushed back to help when the tree caught on fire. But between then? No!

Either somebody lied to you, or they're as blind as you are!"Maybe I'll ask around Tainted Gorge, then."

Do that. Or go back and make sure your source is reliable.

Either way, you and your ridiculous accusations are not welcome here. Get out of my sight!"Thanks. I'll be sure to mention that in my report."

Hm. Seems like everybody has an excuse for not helping...from not enough resources to just being surly.

Jorivah's story is new, though. Interesting that he didn't think to share that...until after you came back alive from fighting those monsters.

We still need something solid to go on, ."I'll keep asking around, Adria."
